name: Ecolet
author: Ecolet

sections.description:
[RO]
Va prezentam un plugin WooCommerce pentru integrarea cu platforma noastra, Ecolet.ro. Aici puteti alege cel mai bun pret de la cei mai importanti curieri si puteti plasa comenzi.
Prin folosirea acestui plugin putem asigura o integrare mai buna care sustine cerintele de ordin functional. De asemenea, ofera, printre altele, suport pentru adresa de livrare astfel incat veti fi siguri ca expedierea ajunge la destinatie.

[EN]
We present to you a WooCommerce plugin for integration with our platform, Ecolet.ro. Here you can choose the best price from the most important couriers and place orders.
Through the use of this plugin we can ensure better integration to support functional requirements. This also provides, amongst others, address support, so you can make sure your parcel is delivered to the right address.
